description: This file defines the TaskViewModel class, managing task data and UI state for a to-do list application. It includes methods for filtering, adding, deleting, toggling, and updating tasks, and interacts with a TaskRepository.

classes.name: TaskViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel managing task list and filtering logic, exposing UI state via StateFlow, and providing methods to interact with tasks.

classes.name: UiState
classes.description: Data class representing the UI state, including list of tasks, current filter, and input text.

classes.name: TaskFilter
classes.description: Enum class for filtering tasks: ALL, ACTIVE, COMPLETED.

methods.name: setFilter
methods.description: Sets the current task filter for UI display.

methods.name: onInputChange
methods.description: Updates the input text used for adding new tasks.

methods.name: addTask
methods.description: Adds a new task with the current input text and clears the input.

methods.name: toggleTask
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of the specified task.

methods.name: updateTaskTitle
methods.description: Updates the title of the specified task.

methods.name: provideFactory
methods.description: Provides a ViewModelFactory to instantiate TaskViewModel with a given repository.
